keyword: calories in chick fil a 8 count nuggets
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A 8 Count Nuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in chick fil a 8 count nuggets—250 kcal total—plus full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for your meal planning.
assumptions: Breaded, pressure-cooked chicken nuggets from Chick-fil-A; standard boneless, bite-sized pieces; no dipping sauce included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; values based on official Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: Chick-fil-A 8 count nuggets provide 250 kcal and 27 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 packet Chick-fil-A sauce per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A 8 count nuggets?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for the standard breaded version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Chick-fil-A 8 count nuggets?
faqs.a: About 27 g of protein per 8-count serving.
They have 13 g carbs total, mostly from breading; grilled version has fewer.

faqs.q: How much sodium in 8 Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: Around 560 mg, which is notable—pair with veggies to balance.

faqs.q: Calories in grilled vs. fried Chick-fil-A 8 count nuggets?
faqs.a: Grilled: 130 kcal; fried: 250 kcal—grilled saves about 120 kcal.
